thread.title: Randy Quaid and his wife Evi Helena Quaid are freed from Vermont jail - Showbiz
thread.title_full: Randy Quaid and his wife Evi Helena Quaid are freed from Vermont jail - Showbiz News - Digital Spy

author: Justin Harp
title: Randy Quaid and his wife Evi Helena Quaid are freed from Vermont jail - Showbiz
text: Randy Quaid and his wife Evi Helena Quaid have been released from a Vermont jail.The Independence Day actor and his wife were picked up in Vermont in connection to vandalism and unauthorised entry charges from an incident in Santa Barbara, California back in 2010.Randy & Evi Quaid released from custody in #vt @bfp_news pic.twitter.com/NYNrrITWVk— Glenn Russell (@GlennVermont) October 15, 2015The couple went before a judge today (October 15), and subsequently were freed when a $500,000 bail request was thrown out. The presiding judge stressed that there were no legal grounds to hold the pair.Quaid's lawyer also successfully argued that the $500,000 bail figure was disproportionate to the $10,000 in damages they are accused of causing in California.Local media documented the couple leaving the courtroom, where the actor's attorney said that they would remain in Vermont because Evi's father is ill. © Canadian Press/REX Shutterstock It is now up to Santa Barbara County's district attorney to decide how she will next continue extradition proceedings, according to multiple media outlets.The pair have lived in Canada since 2010, and have also been charged with failure to appear for a court appearance. Two years ago, Quaid was denied permanent Canadian residency status.
